= AIR-ERP Accounting System =

AIR-ERP is a small Accounting Program Written in powerbuilder 10.5 with the help of Kodigo Explorer written by Yeyi.

== Modules ==
  * Accounts Payable
  * Accounts Receivable
  * Sales and Distribution
  * Inventory and Warehouse management
  * Bank Reconciliation
  * General Accounting
  * Customer Relations
